company_info.Company Description: About Us- Unique Travelite Services Pvt. Ltd.UTS Is An ISO Certified Entity Listed On Ministry Of Corporate Affairs. Our Company Provides Best-In-Class Service In The Travel & Tourism Sector Across World

api_data.job_title: Earn Weekly/ Monthly Pay out- home based Part time . online promotion

jd_information.description: Dear Candidates,Greetings From Unique Travelite services!!!Uniquetravelite Services Is A Leading Organization In Tourism Industry; Dealing In Flights/Holidays (Like Vacation/Honeymoon/Family/Picnic/Group Tour And Customized Packages.We are searching a creative and ambitious person for part time / full time / office based as well as home based jobs. Salary will be on weekly and Monthly basis.We need dedicated Male and Female candidates Work at your convenient time to Earn Extra IncomeWorking just for 2-3 hours per.Feel free to call us:-Bhaumik(HR Executive)8291516381
